name: Lane Defense Wars
description:
Tower building maze defense wars!

  • Two players required: 
    • Keyboard + gamepad - (Any gamepad / controller should work and ensure Gamepad / controller is connected before launching the game)

Controls:

  • Gamepad: Same layout for all controllers.
Gamepad Controls

For example: Press X to select Tile, cycle to defense then press right trigger to buy.

  • Keyboard: 
    • WASD - Player movement
    • A and D - Cycle Defense / Unit to Purchase
    • E - Select Tile to Purchase Defense For
      • R - Buy Tower
    • F - Open Unit Deploy Menu
      • R - Buy Unit
    • Q - Cancel / Close Menu

Objective:

  • Create a maze with defensive towers in your lane.
  • Send units to your opponent.

How To win:

  • Out last the other player, don't let units reach your lane end!

May the best maze win!
